entry.value: select new map(a.id as id,a.articleid as articleid,a.userid as userid,a.commentuser as commentuser,a.comment as comment,a.receiver as receiver,a.approve as approve,a.oppose as oppose,a.currentDate as currentDate,(select b.username from UserInfo b where b.id=a.userid) as username,(select b.picture from UserInfo b where b.id=a.userid) as picture ) from CommentInfo a where a.articleid='{0}' order by a.currentDate desc

select new map(a.id as id,a.userid as userid,a.type as type,a.title as title,a.picture as picture,a.text as text,a.tag as tag,a.love as love,a.brower as brower,a.firstDate as firstDate,a.currentDate as currentDate,b.email as email,b.username as username,b.sign as sign,b.job as job,b.intro as intro,b.phone as phone,b.picture as userpicture,(select count(*) from CommentInfo c where c.articleid=a.id) as commentsum) from ArticleInfo a,UserInfo b where a.userid = b.id {0} order by a.firstDate desc
